actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an individual tax credit for disaster preparation expenses.

summary.text: Revises the Internal Revenue Code to provide an individual income tax credit for disaster preparation expenses. Provides that the amount allowed for such credit shall not exceed $200 for each national disaster requiring preparation expenses.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an individual tax credit for disaster preparation expenses.
